data.text: Padzatuluka mphukira pa tsinde la Yese
Mzimu wa Yehova udzakhala pa iye
Ndipo kuopa Yehova ndiye chidzakhale chinthu chomukondweretsa.
Mʼmbulu udzakhala pamodzi ndi mwana wankhosa,
Ngʼombe yayikazi ndi chimbalangondo zidzadya pamodzi,
Mwana wakhanda adzasewera pa dzenje la mamba,
Tsiku limenelo mfumu yatsopano yochokera pa Muzu wa Yese idzakhala ngati chizindikiro kwa anthu a mitundu yonse. Mitundu ya anthu idzasonkhana kwa Iye, ndipo malo awo okhalapo adzakhala aulemerero.
Tsiku limenelo Ambuye adzatambasula dzanja lake kachiwiri kuti awombole anthu ake otsalira ku Asiriya, ku Igupto, ku Patirosi, Kusi, ku Elamu, ku Sinana, ku Hamati ndi pa zilumba za nyanja yamchere.
Yuda ndi Efereimu adzathira nkhondo pa Afilisti mbali ya kumadzulo;
Padzakhala msewu waukulu woti ayendepo anthu ake otsalira
